fb-not-configured: The $wgFileBrowserDirectory variable is not configured in LocalSettings.php
fb-wrong-configured: The $wgFileBrowserDirectory variable is not configured correctly: '$1'
fb-path-not-found: Path '$1' was not found on the server
fb-file-not-found: File '$1' was not found on the server
fb-api-error-short-term: Search phrase must be at least $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}
